dcterms:creator: Lynn Carlson
Daniel Marcu
Mary Ellen Okurowski
dcterms:description: The English RST Discourse Treebank is a corpus that provides annotated discourse structures based on Rhetorical Structure Theory, consisting of 385 Wall Street Journal articles.
dcterms:title: English RST Discourse Treebank

dcterms:creator: Mathieu Morey
Philippe Muller
Nicholas Asher
dcterms:description: The RST Discourse Treebank provides a dependency perspective on RST discourse parsing and evaluation, contributing to the understanding of discourse structures.
dcterms:title: RST Discourse Treebank
